summary: Vautier, a wealthy surgeon in his fifties, falls in love with Hélène, a young woman from a modest background. He allows her to have a string of short-lived lovers - but when Jean Trapeau, ... See full summary »
cast: Harry Baur|Pierre Blanchar|Alice Field|Paul Azaïs|Christiane Dor|Madeleine Geoffroy|Pierre Stéphen|Madeleine Guitty|Andrée Doria|Josèphe Evelys|Kiki of Montparnasse|Ginette Leclerc|Saint-Allier
title: Cette vieille canaille
